sqlMap.select:
select a.departcode,a.departname, (select count(b.qymc) from t_qyjbxx b where b.gxdwbm like substr(a.departcode, 0, #subCodeLen#) || '%' and b.qybm like #hylbdm# || '%' and b.scbz = '0' and b.zxbz = '0' and b.zt = '1') qyzs, (select count(1) from t_qyryxx c, t_qyjbxx b where c.scbz = '0' and c.zxbz = '0' and b.qyid = c.qyid and b.qybm like #hylbdm#|| '%' and b.gxdwbm like substr(a.departcode, 0, #subCodeLen#) || '%' and b.scbz = '0' and b.zxbz = '0' and b.zt = '1') ryzs,
(select count(1) from t_qczlxxb d, t_qyjbxx b where b.qyid = d.qyid and b.gxdwbm like substr(a.departcode, 0, #subCodeLen#) || '%' and b.scbz = '0' and b.zxbz = '0' and b.zt = '1' and d.blsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.blsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) scyws, (select count(distinct(e.qyid)) from t_qyjbxx e where not exists( select * from t_qczlxxb d where e.qyid = d.qyid and d.blsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.blsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) and e.gxdwbm like substr(a.departcode, 0, #subCodeLen#) || '%' and e.scbz = '0' and e.qybm like #hylbdm# || '%' and e.zxbz = '0' and e.zt = '1' ) wscqys
(select count(1) from t_jxcljbxx d, t_qyjbxx b where b.qyid = d.qyid and b.gxdwbm like substr(a.departcode, 0, 4) || '%' and b.scbz = '0' and b.zxbz = '0' and b.zt = '1' and d.jxzt!=2 and d.scsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.scsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) scyws, (select count(distinct(e.qyid)) from t_qyjbxx e where not exists( select * from t_jxcljbxx d where e.qyid = d.qyid and d.scsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.scsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) and e.gxdwbm like substr(a.departcode, 0, #subCodeLen#) || '%' and e.scbz = '0' and e.qybm like #hylbdm# || '%' and e.zxbz = '0' and e.zt = '1' ) wscqys
(select count(1) from t_escjyxx d, t_qyjbxx b,t_cljbxx c where b.qyid = d.qyid and d.cldjid=c.cljbxxid and b.gxdwbm like substr(a.departcode, 0, #subCodeLen#) || '%' and d.scbz = 0 and b.zxbz=0 and c.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and c.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) scyws, (select count(distinct(e.qyid)) from t_qyjbxx e where not exists( select * from t_escjyxx d,t_cljbxx c where e.qyid = d.qyid and d.cldjid=c.cljbxxid and c.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and c.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) and e.gxdwbm like substr(a.departcode, 0, #subCodeLen#) || '%' and e.scbz = '0' and e.qybm like #hylbdm# || '%' and e.zxbz = '0' and e.zt = '1') wscqys
(select count(1) from t_esjjy d, t_qyjbxx b where b.qyid = d.qyid and b.gxdwbm like substr(a.departcode, 0, #subCodeLen#) || '%' and d.scbz = 0 and b.zxbz=0 and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) scyws, (select count(distinct(e.qyid)) from t_qyjbxx e where not exists( select * from t_esjjy d where e.qyid = d.qyid and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd') and d.scbz=0) and e.gxdwbm like substr(a.departcode, 0, #subCodeLen#) || '%' and e.scbz = '0' and e.qybm like #hylbdm# || '%' and e.zxbz = '0' and e.zt = '1' ) wscqys
(select count(1) from t_czcjsyxx d, t_qyjbxx b where b.qyid = d.qyid and b.gxdwbm like substr(a.departcode, 0, #subCodeLen#) || '%' and b.zxbz=0 and d.cxbz=0 and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) scyws, (select count(distinct(e.qyid)) from t_qyjbxx e where not exists( select * from t_czcjsyxx d where e.qyid = d.qyid and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd') and d.cxbz=0) and e.gxdwbm like substr(a.departcode, 0, #subCodeLen#) || '%' and e.scbz = '0' and e.qybm like #hylbdm# || '%' and e.zxbz = '0' and e.zt = '1' ) wscqys
from t_department a where a.departcode like #likeDepartCode# order by a.departcode

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select distinct a.qyid qyid,a.qybm qybm,a.qymc qymc,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc, a.jjlxmc jjlxmc,a.lxdh lxdh,a.zt zt ,a.zrs zrs from t_qyjbxx a
t_qyryxx t
where a.gxdwbm like #gxdwbm#||'%' and a.qybm like #hylbdm# || '%' and a.scbz = '0' and a.zxbz = '0' and a.zt = '1'
a.qymc like '%$qymc$%'
t.qyid=a.qyid and t.scbz=0 and t.zxbz=0
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$

select count(*) from (select distinct a.qyid qyid,a.qybm qybm,a.qymc qymc,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc, a.jjlxmc jjlxmc,a.lxdh lxdh,a.zt zt ,a.zrs zrs from t_qyjbxx a
t_qyryxx t
where a.gxdwbm like #gxdwbm#||'%' and a.qybm like #hylbdm# || '%' and a.scbz = '0' and a.zxbz = '0' and a.zt = '1'
a.qymc like '%$qymc$%'
t.qyid=a.qyid and t.scbz=0 and t.zxbz=0
)

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.qyid qyid,a.qybm qybm,a.qymc qymc,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc, a.jjlxmc jjlxmc,a.lxdh lxdh,a.zt zt,a.zrs zrs from t_qyjbxx a where a.gxdwbm like #gxdwbm#||'%' and a.qybm like #hylbdm# || '%' and (a.scbz = '0' or (a.scbz = '1' and a.bcsj > trunc(sysdate,'dd') and a.bcsj < trunc(sysdate+1,'dd'))) and (a.zxbz = '0' or (a.scbz = '1' and a.bcsj > trunc(sysdate,'dd') and a.bcsj < trunc(sysdate+1,'dd'))) and a.zt = '1'
a.qymc like '%$qymc$%'
and not exists
( select * from t_qczlxxb d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.blsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.blsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_jxcljbxx d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.scsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.scsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_escjyxx d,t_cljbxx c where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.cldjid=c.cljbxxid and c.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and c.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_esjjy d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd') and d.scbz=0)
( select * from t_czcjsyxx d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd') and d.cxbz=0)
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$

select count(1) from t_qyjbxx a where a.gxdwbm like #gxdwbm#||'%' and a.qybm like #hylbdm# || '%' and (a.scbz = '0' or (a.scbz = '1' and a.bcsj > trunc(sysdate,'dd') and a.bcsj < trunc(sysdate+1,'dd'))) and (a.zxbz = '0' or (a.scbz = '1' and a.bcsj > trunc(sysdate,'dd') and a.bcsj < trunc(sysdate+1,'dd'))) and a.zt = '1'
a.qymc like '%$qymc$%'
and not exists
( select * from t_qczlxxb d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.blsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.blsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_jxcljbxx d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.scsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.scsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_escjyxx d,t_cljbxx c where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.cldjid=c.cljbxxid and c.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and c.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_esjjy d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd') and d.scbz=0)
( select * from t_czcjsyxx d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd') and d.cxbz=0)

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select a.qyid qyid,a.qybm qybm,a.qymc qymc,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc, a.jjlxmc jjlxmc,a.lxdh lxdh,a.zt zt,
(select count(1) from t_qczlxxb d where a.qyid = d.qyid and a.gxdwbm like #gxdwbm#||'%' and a.scbz = '0' and a.zxbz = '0' and a.zt = '1' and d.blsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.blsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) zrs
(select count(1) from t_jxcljbxx d where a.qyid = d.qyid and a.gxdwbm like #gxdwbm#||'%' and a.scbz = '0' and a.zxbz = '0' and a.zt = '1' and d.jxzt!=2 and d.scsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.scsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) zrs
(select count(1) from t_escjyxx d,t_cljbxx c where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.cldjid=c.cljbxxid and a.gxdwbm like #gxdwbm#||'%' and d.scbz = 0 and a.zxbz=0 and c.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and c.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) zrs
(select count(1) from t_esjjy d where a.qyid = d.qyid and a.gxdwbm like #gxdwbm#||'%' and d.scbz = 0 and a.zxbz=0 and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) zrs
(select count(1) from t_czcjsyxx d where a.qyid = d.qyid and a.gxdwbm like #gxdwbm#||'%' and a.zxbz=0 and d.cxbz=0 and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd')) zrs
from t_qyjbxx a where a.gxdwbm like #gxdwbm#||'%' and a.qybm like #hylbdm# || '%'
a.qymc like '%$qymc$%'
and a.scbz = '0' and a.zxbz = '0' and a.zt = '1' and exists
( select * from t_qczlxxb d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.blsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.blsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_jxcljbxx d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.jxzt!=2 and d.scsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.scsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_escjyxx d,t_cljbxx c where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.cldjid=c.cljbxxid and d.scbz = 0 and c.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and c.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_esjjy d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.scbz=0 and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_czcjsyxx d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.cxbz=0 and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$

select count(1) from t_qyjbxx a where a.gxdwbm like #gxdwbm#||'%' and a.qybm like #hylbdm# || '%'
a.qymc like '%$qymc$%'
and a.scbz = '0' and a.zxbz = '0' and a.zt = '1' and exists
( select * from t_qczlxxb d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.blsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.blsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_jxcljbxx d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.jxzt!=2 and d.scsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.scsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_escjyxx d,t_cljbxx c where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.cldjid=c.cljbxxid and d.scbz = 0 and c.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and c.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_esjjy d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.scbz=0 and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
( select * from t_czcjsyxx d where a.qyid = d.qyid and d.cxbz=0 and d.lrsj > trunc(sysdate, 'dd') and d.lrsj < trunc(sysdate+1, 'dd'))
